title: Community Livestream - v.250 Update Preview
content: Join Community Managers Veeraah and Jade in the next Community Livestream as they preview the upcoming events and contents in v.250 Mayple Island.

title: v.249 Hotfixes - April 24, 2024
content: Here you'll find a list of hotfixes that addresses a variety of bugs and issues reported within the v.249 Minar Picnic update.

title: v.250 - Mayple Island Update Preview
content: Celebrate the 19th anniversary of Global MapleStory with wonderful events the fairies of Mayple Island have prepared for you!

title: Marvel Machine Spins Temporarily Unavailable
content: Any remaining Marvel Machine Spins will be temporarily unavailable from May until the next Marvel Machine event.

title: Cash Shop Update on April 17
content: Wisp's Wondrous Wonderberry, Premium Surprise Style Box, and more!
